T04TD3956E:303a-0: @303a * // rang gi bya ba'i rim pa bskul ba dang bcas pa yi ger bris pa bzhugs //
T04TD3956E:303a-2: # // rang gi bya ba'i rim pa bskul ba dang bcas pa yi ger bris pa /
T04TD3956E:303a-3: sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo //
T04TD3956E:303a-4: 'khor ba thog ma med pa nas //
T04TD3956E:303a-5: nyon mongs bag chags tshad med pas //
T04TD3956E:303a-6: yul ngan rkyen dang phrad pa las //
T04TD3956E:303b-0: nyon mongs sdug bsngal @303b skye ba'i tshe //
T04TD3956E:303b-1: rang gi dran pa'i phyir du 'di //
T04TD3956E:303b-2: byas pas de tshe dran par shog / nang gi sems ni dul gyur na //
T04TD3956E:303b-3: phyi yi dgra 'dis gnod mi nus //
T04TD3956E:303b-4: rang gi nang sems g-yo ba na //
T04TD3956E:303b-5: phyi yi dgra 'dis rkyen byas nas //
T04TD3956E:303b-6: nang gi dgra 'dis rang rgyud bsreg / des na nang gi dgra 'di gzhom //
T04TD3956E:303b-7: dug can snod kyis zas brlag bzhin //
T04TD3956E:303b-8: nang gi dri mas dge tshogs brlag / gnyen po chu yis khrus byas nas //
T04TD3956E:303b-9: dag pas bde ba chen po 'thob //
T04TD3956E:303b-10: gang na gnas tshe gang gi tshe //
T04TD3956E:303b-11: gang gi dri ma ldang ba dang //
T04TD3956E:303b-13: thabs ni sna tshogs gsungs pas spang ;
T04TD3956E:303b-14: / dgra gzhom dri ma bkru ba'i phyir //
T04TD3956E:303b-15: de tshe 'bad pa chen po bya //
T04TD3956E:303b-16: gang gis rang gi rgyud 'di la //
T04TD3956E:303b-17: nang du bltas te rang sems brtag / de tshe yul la shes pa skye //
T04TD3956E:303b-18: shes pa skye ba'i yul rnams gsum //
T04TD3956E:303b-19: nyon mongs bar ma dge ba skye //
T04TD3956E:303b-20: rgyu rkyen yul gyi bye brag gis ;
T04TD3956E:303b-21: / nyon mongs skye ba dag la gsum //
T04TD3956E:303b-23: gnyen po'i rim pa'ang de bzhin te //
T04TD3956E:303b-24: chen po skye ba'i yul de la //
T04TD3956E:303b-25: brten te tshogs chen 'bad pas skye //
T04TD3956E:303b-27: chung ngu la ni chung ngu'o //
T04TD3956E:303b-28: chen po kun la skyes na mchog / bar ma lung ma bstan pa yang //
T04TD3956E:303b-29: dran pas zin pa'i sems de yis //
T04TD3956E:303b-30: kun slong rjes kyis dge bar bsgyur //
T04TD3956E:303b-31: thabs sgo sna tshogs pa yis so //
T04TD3956E:303b-32: dge ba che 'bring chung du dag / ngang gis skyes pa'i yul de la //
T04TD3956E:303b-33: sbyor ba dngos dang rjes dag las //
T04TD3956E:303b-34: khyad 'phags bsod nams kun bsngo bya //
T04TD3956E:303b-36: thog med dus nas ji srid du //
T04TD3956E:303b-37: bdag ni dug gsum zhen pas 'khor //
T04TD3956E:303b-38: ji srid skye shi kha brgyud pas //
T04TD3956E:303b-39: de srid las rnams chud re zos //
T04TD3956E:303b-41: de srid sangs rgyas mngon sangs rgyas //
T04TD3956E:303b-42: bdag ni gti mug mun pas bsgribs //
T04TD3956E:303b-43: mun nag glog 'gyu snang ba tsam //
T04TD3956E:303b-44: ci zhig ltar stes dran rnyed tshe //
T04TD3956E:303b-45: de tshe 'bad pas bsgrub par bya //
T04TD3956E:303b-46: 'chi bar nges pa cha yod cing //
T04TD3956E:303b-47: gnas pa'i dbang ster med mod kyi //
T04TD3956E:303b-48: bdag ni re zhig mi 'chi snyam //
T04TD3956E:304a-0: @304a * // dran pa btang ste byang chub bsgrub //
T04TD3956E:304a-1: gzhan dag la yang sgrub par gyis //
T04TD3956E:304a-2: dper na byis pa rig med pas //
T04TD3956E:304a-3: me dang g-yang sogs 'jigs pa med //
T04TD3956E:304a-4: de bzhin 'gro ba gti mug rnams //
T04TD3956E:304a-5: ngan song dag la'ang 'jigs pa med //
T04TD3956E:304a-6: dper na zas mchog ro dang ldan //
T04TD3956E:304a-7: nad pa dag la byin pa'i tshe //
T04TD3956E:304a-8: zas la smod cing mi 'dod bzhin //
T04TD3956E:304a-9: thabs kyi bye brag 'di dag kyang //
T04TD3956E:304a-10: rmongs pa nyon mongs ldan pa la //
T04TD3956E:304a-12: dper na bza' la dga' ba'i mi //
T04TD3956E:304a-13: zos brlag bsags phan cha yod kyang //
T04TD3956E:304a-14: 'dod pas mi tshugs za ba bzhin //
T04TD3956E:304a-15: snga phyi rgyu 'bras cha yod kyang //
T04TD3956E:304a-16: nyon mongs zhen pa stobs cha yod //
T04TD3956E:304a-17: dge med sdig pa sna tshogs spyod //
T04TD3956E:304a-18: dper na kha bya mkhan dag gis //
T04TD3956E:304a-19: kha la bya dgos kun bsgrub zer //
T04TD3956E:304a-20: gzhan gyi dran pa bskyed pa'i tshe //
T04TD3956E:304a-21: de bzhin dge ba bya dgos zer //
T04TD3956E:304a-22: kha cig kha la gleng byed cing //
T04TD3956E:304a-23: zhe la don du sgrub mi byed //
T04TD3956E:304a-24: kha cig 'bras bu don chen po //
T04TD3956E:304a-25: btang nas bya ba chung ngu sgrub //
T04TD3956E:304a-26: de yang byis pa'i spyod pa can //
T04TD3956E:304a-27: kha cig bsam pa rlung bzhin g-yo //
T04TD3956E:304a-28: rung dang mi rung gnyis ka byed //
T04TD3956E:304a-29: kha cig kha dog dkar po bzhin //
T04TD3956E:304a-30: rkyen gang ldan pa de ltar 'gyur //
T04TD3956E:304a-31: kha cig rang nyid ngang gis dge ; grogs kyis rbad pas nyon mongs skyed //
T04TD3956E:304a-32: kha cig rkyen med rgyu dang ldan //
T04TD3956E:304a-33: dam pa'i grogs kyis zin pa na //
T04TD3956E:304a-34: sdig spong dge byed de la bskul //
T04TD3956E:304a-35: kha cig dge la bskul mi dgos //
T04TD3956E:304a-36: rang gi bya ba'i rim pa bskul ba dang bcas pa yi ger bris pa /
T04TD3956E:304a-37: slob dpon mkhas pa chen po dpal mar me mdzad ye shes kyi zhal snga nas mdzad pa rdzogs so /
T04TD3956E:304a-39: // / rgya gar gyi mkhan po chen po de nyid dang /
T04TD3956E:304a-40: zhu chen gyi lo ts'a ba dge slong dge ba'i blo gros kyis bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa//
